issues: Some text may have low contrast against background in certain areas.
Some icons are not aligned to the right of the respective text.
Some elements appear a bit cramped.

slides.summary: The slide is well-structured with a few minor visibility and alignment issues.
recommendations: Increase contrast for text in certain areas to ensure readability.
Align icons consistently to the right side of the text for better visual flow.
Adjust spacing between elements to avoid a cramped appearance.
